casebody.data:
State of North Carolina
v.
Brent Tyler Miller No. 199PA15 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016. Noell P. Tin, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Aisha J. Dennis, Attorney at Law, for Miller, Brent Tyler. Derrick Mertz, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of April 2016 by defendant and designated Defendant-Appellee's Motion to Vacate Bill of Costs: The motion is allowed. Not having been found guilty in the above-captioned matter, defendant is not obligated to pay court costs.

By order of the Court in Conference, this 9th day of June , 2016.
